comment._content: Likely Sun Fo, son of Chinese revolutionary figure Sun Yat-sen, sometime Mayor of Guangdong: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sun_Fo Kind of cool to see him as a young undergraduate--he would have been in his senior year at Berkeley in 1916.

comment._content: Another photo of the young Sun Fo with his father, Sun Yat-sen in: www.chinaheritagequarterly.org/features.php?searchterm=03...
